product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This playful and vibrant banner is designed to promote a children's toy product. It features a soft pink and purple background with flowing abstract shapes and translucent circles that create a whimsical atmosphere. At the center, the "product_image" layer displays a colorful toy playset with cute animal figures, capturing the viewer’s attention. Just above this, the "heading" and "subheading" text layers announce the toy's theme in bold, fun fonts—using vibrant purple and pink hues respectively. Below the image, the "price" text layer prominently showcases the product cost in bold purple. The "cta_background" and "cta" layers form a crisp call-to-action button reading “SHOP NOW” in white text on a purple rectangle.

Color Palette:
- Soft Pink: #FFE6F2
- Bright Pink: #E91E63
- Light Purple: #C48AFF
- Rich Purple: #9C27B0
- Accent Pink: #FF9ECE
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a playful and vibrant color palette, ideal for creating a cheerful advertisement banner. Dominant colors include a bright pink (#F74FA2) used in the cat house, soft mint green (#5ED0A7) for the grassy platform, and warm tan (#F2C49B) representing the sand base and pillars. Additional pops of color include light purple (#C59FEF) in the paw sign and turtle, aqua blue (#4CD4DC) in the food bowl and hammock, and a bold red (#EE1C4E) for the toy fish. These colors blend harmoniously while maintaining contrast to highlight individual features, creating visual interest and a sense of whimsical fun.
